articles.description: Rohit Sharma, Shikhar Dhawan, and KL Rahul are already there and you have someone like Shubman Gill, who has been mighty impressive in the limited opportunities he has got. Already waiting in the wings are Prithvi Shaw and Yashasvi Jaiswal
articles.content: Three consecutive hundreds 108 in the final, 168 in SF, 220* in QF -  in the knockouts, and Ruturaj Gaikwad has ended the dream Vijay Hazare Trophy season with 660 runs, with four hundreds, from just… [+4310 chars]

articles.title: 'Felt Humiliated': Indian chess Grand Master SL Narayanan after being made to stand barefeet for metal detector check in middle of playing hall - The Indian Express
articles.description: Arbiter apologised after the detector beeped for another player as well, but a disturbed Narayanan lost the subsequent match.
articles.content: Indian GM SL Narayanan says he “felt humiliated” after he was made to stand barefoot in the middle of a playing hall before his match while playing in the Bundesliga chess league on Sunday.So affecte… [+3341 chars]

articles.title: India's first openly gay sprinter Dutee Chand posts photo with girlfriend, sparks marriage rumours - India Today
articles.description: India's first openly gay athlete Dutee Chand took to Twitter to post a photo with her girlfriend Monalisa. Chand had earlier spoken about how her family did not take things kindly when she came out as gay.
articles.content: By India Today Web Desk: India's first openly gay sprinter Dutee Chand posted an image on Twitter with her girlfriend Monalisa, sparking rumours of her wedding on Friday, 2 December. Chand, who came … [+1658 chars]
